title: Euopean street sign face?
content:
Good day...I need to make some posters like this...can anyone tell me a face to use which is similar to this?

Thanks in advance...

David

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907154953im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/image002_4996.jpg)

 [‹ Condensed sans on Wangari Maathai "Unbowed" book cover](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907154953/http:/www.typophile.com/node/41630 "Go to previous forum topic") [BOLD Magazine Cover Font ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907154953/http:/www.typophile.com/node/41668 "Go to next forum topic")
author: dla_001

comments.content:
According to [this thread,](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907154953/http:/www.typophile.com/node/39661) Italy uses [Traffic Type Spain](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907154953/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/urw/traffic_type_spain_ot_std/?sample_text=colosseo%20pantheon) for its road signs.

- Lex
